entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as a passenger on the train, described as staring at everyone in the compartment.

entities.name: ma lfoy
entities.description: Ma Lfoy's use of the word 'dogging' is questioned by Luna Lovegood.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione suggests changing into their prefect robes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is checking how his prefect badge looks in the window.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is sitting with his forehead pressed against the train window.

relationships.description: Luna Lovegood questions Ma Lfoy's use of the word 'dogging'.
Hermione and Ron are working together to pin their prefect badges on.
Harry is trying to get a glimpse of Hogwarts through the train window.
Luna Lovegood is staring at everyone in the compartment.
